definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: The lesions will "bleach out" and become clean wounds that will heal after a molt.
sentences.chinese: 病變會“漂白了”，成爲清潔傷口癒合後，將蛻皮。

sentences.english: First, bleach should be referred to as full-strength household bleach.
sentences.chinese: 首先，應該濃縮的家用漂白粉。

sentences.english: I do not deny that your No. 33 bleached cotton is top quality.
sentences.chinese: 意思爲我不否認你的33號漂白棉花質量是頂級的。

sentences.english: The factory produces bleach and washing-up liquid.
sentences.chinese: 這家工廠生產漂白液和餐具的洗滌液。

sentences.english: Also, mop your bathroom floor once a week with a bleach-based cleanser.
sentences.chinese: 每週還應用漂白清潔劑擦拭浴室地板。

sentences.english: The applications of ligninase in the bleaching were mainly discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文着重介紹了三種木素降解酶在漂白中的應用。

sentences.english: it's your teeth. Did you get your teeth whitened?
sentences.chinese: 是你的牙齒。你去漂白牙齒了嗎？

sentences.english: My knuckles whitened from my tense grip on the steering wheel.
sentences.chinese: 我的指關節從我在方向盤的緊張的夾子漂白了。

sentences.english: The effects of bleaching on dirt count of bleached whole cotton stalk chemical pulp were studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 對漂白對全棉稈漂白化學漿塵埃度的影響進行了研究。

sentences.english: The effects of bleaching on dirt count of bleached whole cotton stalk chemical pulp were studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 對漂白對全棉稈漂白化學漿塵埃度的影響進行了研究。

sentences.english: Note that bleaching is a permanent color change that is not reversible.
sentences.chinese: 要注意的是，漂白劑具有永久性。

sentences.english: He is blanching linen in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 他正在陽光下漂白亞麻布。

sentences.english: Add 2 tablespoons of bleach to a hot wash cycle.
sentences.chinese: 加2湯匙的漂白水熱洗週期。

sentences.english: Nor age, to blanch thy vermeil hue.
sentences.chinese: 花尚未放，竟漂白了你的鮮豔。

sentences.english: Coniferous chemical wood pulp, sulphite other than dissolving grades, unbleached.
sentences.chinese: 針葉樹亞硫酸鹽化學木漿，溶解級除外，未漂白。

sentences.english: Unbleached sack kraft paper, uncoated, in rolls or sheets.
sentences.chinese: 未漂白袋用牛皮紙，未塗布，捲筒或平版。

definition: to lose color/to turn pale/to bleach/to fade
variant of 褪色[tui4 se4]/also pr. [tui4 shai3]
to lose color/to fade/also pr. [diao4 shai3]
